title: 91/93/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 February 1991 determining the period of the year during which Portugal may dispatch certain equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 11 February 1991  determining the period of the year during which Portugal may dispatch certain equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness  (91/93/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
Portugal may dispatch equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness from 1 February to 30 April.  Article 2
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 February 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission   (1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 42.
